course_description: This course will examine the theoretical principles underlying the fields of study identified as -omics including genomics, transcriptomics, epigenomics, metabolomics, and microbiomics. The biology of these fields of study will be presented along with their application to knowledge discovery, precision medicine/nursing, and the development of targeted interventions to improve health outcomes.
sections: Class Nbr: 3072, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-3:50p, Instructor: Yang/Hertzberg, Status: Open
